NAME: bonus
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to add bonus invitations to an user.
IS_BOT: Cannot add a bonus to a bot.
SUCCESS: The member(s) received their bonus. Note that blacklisted members have been ignored.
OPTION_AMOUNT_DESCRIPTION: The amount you want to add/remove (add - before the amount to remove)
OPTION_MEMBER_DESCRIPTION: The member you want to add/remove the bonus to
